text: Philipp Veit (13 February 1793 â€“ 18 December 1877) was a German Romantic painter. One of Veit's most important paintings was Germania in 1848. == Biography == Veit was born in Berlin, Prussia. He was the son of a banker Simon Veit == Related pages == *List of German painters Category:1793 births Category:1877 deaths Category:German painters
